summary: In a sunken castle underneath the earth, five strangers wake. They have no food. No memory. No water. And no way out. They must organize and band together for the sinister adventure that awaits.
cast: Warren Kole|Bai Ling|Jaime Ray Newman|Dustin Nguyen|Nick Lane|Jude Ciccolella|Will Blagrove|Queenie Tai|Ben Pace|Murielle Telio|Joshua Wheeler|Frank Smith|Wilboy Wilson|Neil Whitely|P. David Miller|Pati Lauren|Karl Dominik|Ezequiel Martinez|Lelis Henriquez|Joshua Bruner|Nazrin Azerbaijan|Lisa Russ|Verity Williams|Richie Bruderick|David Licano|Jacquie Nguyen|Eddie Underwood|Chris Verrill
title: The Gauntlet
